title: How Can I Stop Living Paycheck to Paycheck? (Hour 1)
description:
Take our Audience Survey & Enter to Win a $500 Visa Gift Card: Click here to take the survey

Dave Ramsey & George Kamel discuss:

Paying off your debt more quickly,

Converting a traditional retirement account to a Roth,

What to do with profit from selling a property,

Getting on track after living paycheck to paycheck,

How to use increased income,

Why indexed universal life insurance sucks.


Support Our Sponsor:

Christian Healthcare Ministries

PODS Moving & Storage

LegacyBox


Want a plan for your money? Find out where to start: https://bit.ly/3nInETX
Listen to all The Ramsey Network podcasts: https://bit.ly/3GxiXm6
